subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Calling Boston’s Shawn Thornton’s pummeling of Pittsburgh’s Brooks Orpik a reckless act, N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman refuses to reduce his 15-game ban.
